user_instruction: 'Respond to Mark'"'"'s email (mark@email.com) with some insights on our university'"'"'s approach to student performance. You can check out my Gmail and NotionManager for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Hello [colleague/assistant],

Could you please:

1. Check my Gmail inbox for the recent message from mark@email.com to make sure we address his specific questions.
2. Look in NotionManager for any pages, notes, or documentation outlining our university’s policies and strategies on student performance (e.g., assessment methods, intervention programs, data-tracking tools, recent outcomes).

A brief summary or bullet-point list of the most relevant information from both sources would be perfect. Once I have that, I can draft a thorough reply to Mark.

Thank you very much!

final_output:
